translater_name: For Translaters: If you are translating this file, put in your name here. This will be present in the credits section.
translater_url: For Translaters: If you do have any social link, you can also put it here, the credits section will link to your profile.
exit_text: Are you sure you want to exit?
about_text:
This is a program for migrating modding instances between different mod managers.

Developed by Cutleast. (NexusMods | GitHub | Ko-Fi)
Idea and logo Wuerfelhusten. (NexusMods)

Material Icons by Google LLC.
Qt by The Qt Company Ltd.
Elusive Icons by Redux Framework
FontAwesome Icons by FontAwesome
name: Name
select_source_text:
Select the mod manager
from which you want to migrate an instance.
select_destination_text:
Select the mod manager
to which an instance should be migrated.
select_src_instance_text:
Select the instance
which should be migrated.
select_dst_instance_text: Configure the instance according to your wishes.
vortex_notice:
Only the active profile can be migrated from Vortex.
Also, make sure that the profile is currently deployed and the plugins are sorted via Vortex.
Select the mod staging folder from Vortex below.
invalid_staging_folder: Invalid staging folder. Make sure that you select a valid staging folder and the profile has been deployed.
enough_space_text:
Before migrating, make sure you have enough free space ([FREE_SPACE]).
Required for the instance: [REQUIRED_SPACE]
migration_complete_purge_notice:
Instance successfully migrated.
If not already done, purge the game folder in Vortex
to avoid duplicates in the destination mod manager.
detected_root_files:
Files have been detected that cannot be managed by mod managers other than Vortex. (for eg. SKSE)
They must therefore be copied directly to the game directory for the instance to work in the destination mod manager.
To do this, open Vortex and purge the game directory.
Then click 'Continue' to complete the migration process.
hardlink_notice:
This method uses hard links instead of copying the files. Windows will think that the files exist twice.
The files in the Mod Organizer folder are just a mirror image of the Vortex file structure and thus do not consume any more disk space.
 Your new instance has to be present on the same hard drive as the source instance folder.
Also, creating hardlinks is much faster than copying each file..
hardlink_drive_error: When using the hardlink method, you must set the destination ([DESTDRIVE]) on the same hard drive where the source instance folder is located. ([SOURCEDRIVE])
copy_notice:
This method copies the files directly to your new instance.
You should really use hardlinks (unless you know what you are doing.)
 If you copy these files directly, the process is going to take a lot longer
and the new instance will require additional space on your hard drive.
wipe_notice: One or more of the specified folders already exists. If you continue, their contents will be deleted.
detected_same_path: The source and destination paths must be different!
update_available:
It seems like your version of MMM is outdated. You are using the version [OLD_VERSION].
Version [NEW_VERSION] is already available. Do you want to download it now?
permission_error:
Access denied. Start MMM as administrator and try again.
If the program is already running with administrator rights, make sure that the administrator has the necessary read and write permissions.
